name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An action-adventure game set in an open world where players can explore the landscape of Hyrule and defeat the evil Calamity Ganon.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic tale of life in Americaâ€™s unforgiving heartland, where players navigate the challenges of the Wild West era.

name: Overwatch
description: A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter with unique heroes and fast-paced gameplay.

name: Minecraft
description: A block-building sandbox game where players can create, explore, and survive in a vast, procedurally generated world.

name: God of War
description: A story-driven action-adventure game that follows Kratos and his son Atreus on a journey across the realms of Norse mythology.

name: Final Fantasy XV
description: An epic journey of Prince Noctis and his friends as they embark on a quest to reclaim their homeland from the clutches of an enemy empire.

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: A fantasy RPG set in the continent of Tamriel where players can explore the world, join factions, and shape the fate of the land.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Follow the story of Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, as he searches for his missing adopted daughter amidst a war-torn continent.

name: Dark Souls III
description: An unforgiving action-RPG that challenges players with intense combat and deep lore in a dark, interconnected world.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
description: Embark on an epic journey in Ancient Greece, where players can shape their own fate and become a legendary Spartan hero.

name: Apex Legends
description: A free-to-play battle royale game where players join forces in squads and battle for supremacy.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: A single-player game that puts players in the shoes of a shinobi on a mission to rescue his kidnapped lord and seek revenge on his arch-nemesis.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Set in a dystopian future, players explore the vast city of Night City and make choices that shape the story and world around them.

name: Monster Hunter: World
description: Hunt gigantic monsters in lush ecosystems and use the materials gathered from fallen foes to craft new gear and take on bigger challenges.

name: Celeste
description: A challenging platformer that tells the story of Madeline's journey to the top of Celeste Mountain.

name: Doom Eternal
description: The next leap in push-forward, first-person combat, as the DOOM Slayer returns to take on new and familiar demons.

name: Death Stranding
description: From legendary game creator Hideo Kojima comes an all-new, genre-defying experience, as players traverse a ravaged wasteland to reconnect a fractured society.
